title: Magic Marsh
paragraph: This island outside the starter region is characterized by a fabled forest and the overgrown and wet environment. But if you are brave enough to fight your way through the swamp, you can find lost artifacts or even treasure.

dynamicContents.content: Around the island, the heavy defender {{ Elder Spirit # article/units/elder-spirit }} can be found. And in the swamps outside the forest are the {{ Nyxis # article/units/nyxi }}. Explore the island can be very valuable to find ancient artifacts.

The fields around the portal are magic forest fields. The swamp is located outside of the magic forest. There are a few important special fields on the Magic Marsh: A magic treasure and two ancient artifacts.
